Html:
I've tried the code described on this page:

http://blogs.windowsclient.net/ricciolocristian/archive/2008/11/07/real-force-theme-on-wpf.aspx

When I run it, I can't see anything happening.  Am I doing something wrong or should this code still work?

Never mind.  I think I got it to work.  I think the problem was that I already had a theme in the merged dictionary.  I think it would not use anything BUT that one.  I'll have to do some more research to be sure.

Now I have a different question.  I was able to call the ForceTheme during the app creation.  Then I tried putting such a call in a button click on the window.  I suspect the change happened, but I need something to tell the window to reflect the change.

What do you suppose that might be?
